meanings.definition: Marked with red letters or symbols for emphasis or decoration.
meanings.sent1: The rubricated title on the book cover caught my eye.
meanings.sent2: The rubricated text stood out against the plain background.
meanings.sent3: The rubricated notes added a pop of color to the page.
meanings.sent4: Her rubricated handwriting made the message more striking.
meanings.sent5: The rubricated design made the invitation look elegant.

meanings.definition: To add red letters or symbols for emphasis or decoration.
meanings.sent1: She rubricated the important points in her presentation.
meanings.sent2: The artist rubricated the borders of the painting.
meanings.sent3: He rubricated the menu to make it more visually appealing.
meanings.sent4: The teacher rubricated the key terms for the students to remember.
meanings.sent5: They rubricated the cover of the report to make it stand out.
